overview: These guys are hungry for two things - cock and sneakers, but not necessarily in that order. Is it the scent? The taste? Sneakers, trainers, whatever you want to call them they have a distinct quality and these boys can't get enough. Testosterone and sweat hang heavy in the air as these horny guys get down and dirty in duets and threesomes. Watch as they devour cocks, asses and get a kick out of a well-worn sneaker. The boys are hot, the sex is hard and it's all waiting right here. Well, if the shoe fits.
title: Deep Down
